targets.query:
from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "totalusage_power_minute_average_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Total Power"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Total Power"])

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "totalusage_energy_today_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Energy Today"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Energy Today"])

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "solar_roof_power_minute_average_3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then -r._value else r._value}))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Solar Power"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Solar Power"])

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "balance_power_minute_average_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Net (Grid)"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Net (Grid)"])

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "totalusage_power_minute_average_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Total Usage"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Total Usage"])

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "solar_roof_power_minute_average_3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: -r._value}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Solar"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Solar"])

from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.entity_id == "balance_power_minute_average_2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Net (Grid)"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "Net (Grid)"])
